citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am on
24-Apr-17.
Reached owner by phone. Owner is canceling the license as facility has sold all regulated animals and is no longer
conducting regulated activities.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 9:50 am on
24-Apr-17.
Reached owner by phone.  Owner is canceling the license as facility has sold all regulated animals and is no longer
conducting regulated activities.
